channel.title: Programming Interfaces on Ozone
channel.description: Recent content in Programming Interfaces on Ozone

item.title: Java API
item.description: Ozone has a set of Native RPC based APIs. This is the lowest level API’s on which all other protocols are built. This is the most performant and feature-full of all Ozone protocols.

item.title: Ozone File System
item.description: Hadoop Compatible file system allows any application that expects an HDFS like interface to work against Ozone with zero changes. Frameworks like Apache Spark, YARN and Hive work against Ozone without needing any change.

item.title: S3 Protocol
item.description: Ozone supports Amazon’s Simple Storage Service (S3) protocol. In fact, You can use S3 clients and S3 SDK based applications without any modifications with Ozone.
